about_the_game:
Enter a world of mystery, danger, and lightning-fast action in PROTAGONIST COMPLEX, a pulse-pounding 2D action game that blends the intensity of razor-sharp melee action with eerie atmosphere.

Fast-Paced, Empowering Gameplay.

Feel like a true badass as you slice through enemies with precision and power. Every encounter is a dance of death where you're always just a few hits away from victory or defeat.

Challenging Yet Rewarding.

Master a combat system that rewards aggression and caution in equal measure. Push forward to dominate your foes, but manage your resources carefully – one misstep could be your last.

Vibrant 2D Graphics.

Immerse yourself in a visually striking world brought to life with bold, eye-catching 2D art that pops off the screen.

Smashing Evil to a Killer Soundtrack.

Annihilate your enemies to the beat of a heart-pumping electronic soundtrack inspired by the best of 2000s electronica. Feel the rhythm of combat as you take down hordes of foes.

name: Protagonist Complex

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660, AMD Radeon RX 590, Intel Iris XE
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: Enter a world of mystery, danger, and lightning-fast action in PROTAGONIST COMPLEX, a pulse-pounding 2D action game that blends the intensity of razor-sharp melee action with eerie atmosphere.
